attributes.action: To Honour the Governments pledge of a referendum to exit EU......
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the labour party manifesto of 1997, Tony Blair running for PM, pledged to go to the country on whether we should continue to be a member of the European Union. We demand that this promise is honoured, so we regain sovereignty of our country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
